amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.para: Nothing in sections 18-2501 to 18-2536 shall apply to procedures for initiatives or referendums provided in sections 14-210 to 14-212 relating to metropolitan-class cities, sections 18-412 and 18-412.02 relating to municipal light and power plants, sections 70-504 and 70-650.01 relating to public power districts, and sections 80-203 to 80-205 relating to soldiers and sailors monuments.
